statements: DELETE FROM BiomassResources WHERE region='Europe' AND biomass_type='Wood';
DELETE FROM BiomassResources WHERE region = 'North' AND biomass_type = 'Wood';
DELETE FROM BiomassResources WHERE biomass_quantity > 1000 AND biomass_unit = 'kg';
DELETE FROM biomass_resources WHERE biomass_type = 'Wood Chips';
DELETE FROM biomass_resources WHERE harvest_date < '2022-01-01' AND biomass_quantity > 5000;
DELETE FROM production_output WHERE site_id = 3 AND date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM Biomass_Transportation WHERE transportation_mode = 'Truck' AND distance > 100;
DELETE FROM Biomass_Resources WHERE region = 'North' AND quantity < 1000;
DELETE FROM Biomass_Distribution WHERE distribution_center = 'Center A' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
